query.statement:
SELECT A.CON_KEY ,'X' AS BANSONG ,A.VKGRP ,A.LIFNR ,A.LNAME ,A.TRANS ,A.DEL ,A.MDT ,A.MTM ,A.MID ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = A.MID) AS MID_NM ,A.TDT ,A.TID ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = A.TID) AS TID_NM ,A.TTM ,A.S007 ,A.S020 ,A.S023 ,A.S033 ,A.S028 ,A.S029 ,A.S030 ,A.S031||' '||A.S032 AS S031 ,B.S051 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'A' THEN '지로' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'B' THEN 'CMS' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'C' THEN '장기미수1' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'D' THEN '장기미수2' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'E' THEN '장기미수3' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'F' THEN '전환안내' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'G' THEN 'FM제안서' WHEN SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'H' THEN '대금납부요청서' END S007_NM ,B.S077 -- 프로젝트 ,ZC001.CTEXT2 VKGRP_NM ,ZC002.CTEXT2 S004_NM ,'' CHK ,CASE WHEN B.S158 = '' THEN B.S168 ELSE B.S158 END AS BSTNK ,SUBSTR(B.S078,1,10) KUNNR ,CS715.DATA_CD ,CS715.DATA_CDATE ,CASE WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '20' THEN '제작완료' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '21' THEN '매수초과' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '22' THEN '파일오류' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '23' THEN '첨부파일누락' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '24' THEN '제작전 취소' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '61' THEN '수취인건수 오류' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '62' THEN '첨부파일 없음' WHEN CS715.DATA_CD = '' THEN CS715.DATA_CD END AS DATA_CD_NM ,CASE WHEN CS716.DELIVRSLTCD = '1' THEN '배달완료' WHEN CS716.DELIVRSLTCD = '2' THEN '배달중' WHEN CS716.DELIVRSLTCD = '3' THEN '이사간곳발송' WHEN CS716.DELIVRSLTCD = '4' THEN '반송' WHEN CS716.DELIVRSLTCD = '5' THEN '반송불능' WHEN CS716.DELIVRSLTCD = '8' THEN '계약등기 주소갱신' END AS DELIVRSLTCD ,CS716.DELIVYMD ,CS717.CDATE ,CASE WHEN CS717.RETURNCD = '1' THEN '이사감' WHEN CS717.RETURNCD = '2' THEN '주소오류' WHEN CS717.RETURNCD = '3' THEN '미거주' WHEN CS717.RETURNCD = '4' THEN '수취거부' WHEN CS717.RETURNCD = '5' THEN '반송함' WHEN CS717.RETURNCD = '6' THEN '기타' END AS RETURNCD_NM ,CS717.CTEXT AS RTEXT
FROM ( SELECT CS717.S020 ,CS717.S028 ,CS717.CDATE ,CS717.RETURNCD ,CS717.CTEXT ,CS717.MANDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST717 AS CS717 WHERE CS717.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND CS717.CDATE BETWEEN #DAT1# AND #DAT2#
) AS CS717 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST701 A ON A.MANDT = CS717.MANDT AND A.S020= CS717.S020 AND INT(A.S028)= INT(CS717.S028)
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST702 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CON_KEY = B.CON_KEY AND A.VKGRP = B.VKGRP
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZC001 ON ZC001.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZC001.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND ZC001.CODE2 = A.VKGRP AND ZC001.LANG = 'ko'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZC002 ON ZC002.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZC002.CODE1 = 'CSS004' AND ZC002.CODE2 = A.S004 AND ZC002.LANG = 'ko'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST715 CS715 ON A.MANDT = CS715.MANDT AND A.S020= CS715.CON_KEY
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST716 CS716 ON A.MANDT = CS716.MANDT AND A.S033= CS716.CS716_SEQ
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DEL = '' AND A.CON_KEY LIKE '_%' AND A.TRANS = 'Y'
AND B.S077 LIKE #PJT#||'%'
AND A.VKGRP = #VKGRP#
AND SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) IN ('C', 'D', 'E')
AND SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'F'
AND SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) IN ('A', 'B')
AND SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'G'
AND SUBSTR(A.S007,3,1) = 'H'
AND A.S004 = #SEAL#
AND A.S004 = #SEAL#
AND A.S004 = #SEAL#
WITH UR
